reviews.review: Juegazo quien lo juegue lo disfrutara no importa cuando.

A game where you really take the time for to solve good designed and complicated puzzles and do not accept that you give up. The puzzles combined with the story line in the game really makes it an enjoyable game and one that every gamer should have played.
真的是很有创意的游戏
Cake is a lie!
One of my alltime favorites. I liked the game before I played it.

Portal 2 is one of my favourite games, I've replayed it several times. I love the humour and the story line.

Possivelmente um dos melhores jogos quebra-cabeças de sempre.
Ultimo grande jogo da Valve, pena que eles pararam de fazer jogos como este.
gud
This game is such an amazing game like no other. Totally original concept with an amazing story line. Would reccomend to anyone who asked. Great game.
Одна из самых классных игр, в которые мне приходилось играть
I love this game! It has puzzle that really make think, and when you're done with the campain you can download levels from the work shop.

Excelente juego. Me encanta la complejidad, dificultad y variedad con la que cuentan todos y cada uno de los escenarios para poder llegar a la resolución de los mismos. Muy recomendable para aquellas personas que no suelen usar su cerebro seguido y necesitan de algún reto. Sin mencionar lo dinámico que es el modo cooperativo.

Was soll ich sagen?
Einfach ein super Spiel, absolutes Must-Have!
Die Story ist leider (meiner Meinung nach) viel zu kurz.
10,5/10

Este juego, es una obra maestra. Simplemente es hermoso, los personajes, la historia, el cooperativo, etc. 
De las mejores segundas partes de la historia que te pueden enojar por pasar 3 horas en un puzzle.

Изумительно! Играл в 2 части, очень понравились! Жду 3-ю.

Portal 2, like Portal is one of those games that will really screw with your mind. The atmospheres created in the level which are set in the abandoned halls of Aperture make this game something to remember.
Un gioco incredibile, incredibilmente divertente, incredibilmente lungo, incredibilmente appassionante.
Beyin Yakan, Ellerini titreten, Sizi ''Acaba Şuraya Portal Açsam Diğerini Nereye Açarım'' Dedirten; Multiplayer'ında ise Arkadaşından Yardım Beklettiren Güzel Bir Puzzle Oyunu.
Очешуенно,  я бы фильм посмотрел!

Jogo fantástico, 10/10 história criativa, nenhum bug que possa ser notado na história principal, personagens ( que falam ) cativantes, puzzles com bastante variedade, um jogo que ainda pode ser divertido e apreciado depois de mais de 5 anos de lançamento.
Fun.

Definatly a great pick me up from the First game. 

Cannot wait for the third game in the Franchise
Good story line <3
Świetna gra, genialny klimat.
Played this over and over again and it never gets dull
Totally not doing this for the steam awards badge

Best game ever!

I will burn its house again! With lemons!

Ein Klassiker unter den Rätselspielen, der mit GLaDOS einer der witzigsten und faszinierendsten Antagonisten der Spielegeschichte liefert. Der Soundtrack, vor allem der End-Credit-Song bleibt dabei wohl immer in Erinnerung.

Ein Grund immer wieder die Welt von Portal, oder sollte ich eher sagen das Half-Life Universum, zu betreten sind dabei wohl die zahlreichen Community Mods. Mods wie Portal Stories: Mel, Thinking with Time Machine , Aperture Tag oder die zahlreichen Karten aus dem Workshop sind dabei genauso großartig wie das Hauptspiel selbst.
Sehr geiles Spiel, man muss halt manchmal etwas denken.
kek
still awsome game
Очень классное продолжение первой части
Great story, cool mechanics and fun multiplayer

"Portal 2 - ob das an den ersten Teil rankommt?" - so etwas habe ich mir gefragt, als ich mir damals Portal 2 in einem Sale gekauft habe. Und man hat mich eines Besseren belehrt! Schöne und teils fordernde Singleplayer-Kampage, spannende Eastereggs, witzige Nebencharaktere und eine aufgebohrte SOURCE-Engine, die schönere Schatten wirft, als manch ein aktuellerer Titel. Und dann kommt da ja noch der Coop-Modus, welcher durch die Community-Maps nahezu unbegrenzt erweitert wird. Stellenweise habe ich mit einem Kumpel eine halbe Stunde vor einem Rätsel gehangen - und dennoch war es nie frustrierend. Also los - kauft euch dieses Stück Spielgeschichte! ;-)
Que ce soit e ncoop ou en solo, Portal 2 est toujours fun à jouer. Des graphismes corrects, un gameplay de folie, ce jeu est super! :D

Best solo game i've played so far.
Finished it at least 10 times!
Have a try

Heard a lot about this game. Didnt expect much from it to be honest (thought it was over-hyped). But then I started playing and was hooked. The story was fairly good (at least better than expected) and the funny plot-twists were cool done also. Lot of humour in there. Loved it!

Also I was for a long while during/after this game still busy at night in my dreams solving all kinds of puzzles ;<
best game evah
이걸...안해?
One of the best sequels I've played thru
Best game ever

Злодей которого хочется обнять ^^
Excellent mechanics, replayable because of a community puzzle builder. Hilarious dialogues between characters and solid gameplay. Definitely worth the purchase!

Jedna z najlepszych gier absolutny top 10. W momencie wydania HL 2 oraz gravity gun to było coś, jak daleko można rozwinąć ideę obrazuje seria Portal. Setki map ze steamworks oraz dodatki. Absolutny must have.
Es un juego entretenido y divertido. Tampoco importa la edad que tengas.

В этой игре мне понравился довольно интересный сюжет (в кооперативе тоже есть). Классно впихнули в игру сюжетку, хотя со стороны кажется, что это нельзя. Так же можно скачивать или делать свои карты. А некоторые люди умудряются даже отдельные моды делать. Рекомендую.

UPD 22.11.2017
К сожалению теперь занимается игрой только её сообщество. А жаль.

I finished Portal 1 & 2 on ps3 years ago. I just got back into pc gaming and saw this for sale. I knew how good it was and was happy to buy it again. I also just got a Steam Controller and it works really well with this game. It is a great game! But also fantastic for learning the SC.
An all time classic. Even if you don't like puzzle games it really is enjoyable!
If you liked Portal, you're going to love this... It's longer and has more varied puzzles than the first game... plus great music...

Took what you liked about the first game and improved it in almost every aspect. If you like the first game, this is a must-play. If you like puzzle games and you haven't played the first game, play the first game and get to this. Trust me, even if you don't like puzzle games, this game could be an exception.

What? You don't like the game, and now you're mad at me for my review? Okay. Look. We both said a lot of things that you're going to regret. But I think we can put our differences behind us. For science. You monster.
